'''Asia Bibi''' (also spelled '''Aasiya''';<ref name=fears>{{cite news | url = http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-south-asia-11923701 | title = Fear for Pakistan's death row Christian woman | last = | first = |date = 5 December 2010 | work = [[BBC]] | accessdate = 5 December 2010}}</ref> real name '''Asia Noreen''')<ref name=kazim>{{cite news |url=http://www.spiegel.de/panorama/gesellschaft/0,1518,729847,00.html |work=[[Der Spiegel]] |first=Hasnain |last=Kazim |title=Eine Ziege, ein Streit und ein Todesurteil |trans_title=A goat, a fight and a death sentence |date=November 19, 2010 |accessdate=November 19, 2010 |language=German}}</ref> is a [[Christianity in Pakistan|Pakistani Christian]] woman who has been convicted [[Blasphemy law in Pakistan|by a Pakistani court of blasphemy]], receiving a death sentence by [[hanging]]. The verdict, which would need to be upheld by a superior court, has received worldwide attention. If executed, Bibi would be the first person in Pakistan to be lawfully killed for blasphemy.<ref name=aps>{{cite news |url=http://news.yahoo.com/s/afp/20101111/wl_sthasia_afp/pakistanunrestreligionchristian |first=Waqar |last=Hussain |title=Christian Woman Sentenced to Death |publisher=[[Agence France-Presse]] |date=November 11, 2010 |accessdate=November 11, 2010}}</ref><ref name=tele>{{cite news |url=http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newstopics/religion/8120142/Christian-woman-sentenced-to-death-in-Pakistan-for-blasphemy.html |first1=Rob |last1=Crilly |first2=Aoun |last2=Sahi |title=Christian Woman sentenced to Death in Pakistan for blasphemy |work=[[The Daily Telegraph]] |date=November 9, 2010 |accessdate=November 11, 2010}}</ref>
'''Asia Bibi''' (also spelled '''Aasiya''';<ref name=fears>{{cite news | url = http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-south-asia-11923701 | title = Fear for Pakistan's death row Christian woman | last = | first = |date = 5 December 2010 | work = [[BBC]] | accessdate = 5 December 2010}}</ref> real name '''Asia Noreen''')<ref name=kazim>{{cite news |url=http://www.spiegel.de/panorama/gesellschaft/0,1518,729847,00.html |work=[[Der Spiegel]] |first=Hasnain |last=Kazim |title=Eine Ziege, ein Streit und ein Todesurteil |trans_title=A goat, a fight and a death sentence |date=November 19, 2010 |accessdate=November 19, 2010 |language=German}}</ref> is a [[Christianity in Pakistan|Pakistani Christian]] woman who has been convicted [[Blasphemy law in Pakistan|by a Pakistani court of blasphemy]], receiving a death sentence by [[hanging]]. The verdict, which would need to be upheld by a superior court, has received worldwide attention. If executed, Bibi would be the first person in Pakistan to be lawfully killed for blasphemy.<ref name=aps>{{cite news |url=http://news.yahoo.com/s/afp/20101111/wl_sthasia_afp/pakistanunrestreligionchristian |first=Waqar |last=Hussain |title=Christian Woman Sentenced to Death |publisher=[[Agence France-Presse]] |date=November 11, 2010 |accessdate=November 11, 2010}}</ref><ref name=tele>{{cite news |url=http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/newstopics/religion/8120142/Christian-woman-sentenced-to-death-in-Pakistan-for-blasphemy.html |first1=Rob |last1=Crilly |first2=Aoun |last2=Sahi |title=Christian Woman sentenced to Death in Pakistan for blasphemy |work=[[The Daily Telegraph]] |date=November 9, 2010 |accessdate=November 11, 2010}}</ref>
